title: Miranda Kerr gives birth to baby son with Evan Spiegel and confirms his name

Miranda Kerr has given birth to her and Evan Spiegel's second child together - and announced his name.

Sharing a snap of her son's little blanket on Instagram , 36-year-old Miranda wrote: "We are overjoyed at the arrival of Myles and so appreciate everyone's kind words and wishes during this special time.

"We couldn't be more excited to welcome our beautiful son into our family."

She and Snapchat CEO Evan, 29, already have son Hart, who was born in May 2018, while she and Orlando Bloom also share eight-year-old Flynn from their previous relationship.

The happy couple, who married in 2017, revealed Miranda was expecting again in March this year, just 10 months after Hart was born.

In a statement, they said: "Miranda, Evan, Flynn and Hart are looking forward to welcoming the newest member to their family."

The Victoria's Secret model has previously spoken about her life with Evan.

She told E! News that she quickly knew that he was 'the one' after they met at a Louis Vuitton dinner in New York City in 2014.

(Image: Getty Images North America)

Miranda told them: "He's just a really kind person, very genuine, very authentic.

"I really appreciate that about him. And also, he's very intelligent. We started out as friends, and eventually, it developed into more."

They married two years ago at Evan's home in Brentwood, California, in a 'small but lavish' ceremony.

Congratulations, Miranda and Evan!
description: Supermodel Miranda Kerr and Evan Spiegel have welcomed their little boy into the world
